title: Self-Regulated Learning Competencies and Interest Sustainment Strategies in Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Mobile-Based Learning Course Covering Advanced Topics in Elementary Science in a BYOD Environment, Applying Project-Based Assessment to Foster Self-Regulated Learning Efforts and Strategies for Sustained Interest

learning_goals: Learners can set daily learning goals and develop action plans independently within four weeks.
Learners can write and submit self-regulated learning logs at least three times per week in a mobile microlearning environment.
Learners can maintain situational interest and complete final outcomes through a science inquiry project.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
